title: Bridge City Squeegee
subtitle: Professionals who care for your windows, gutters and more.

serviceType.label: Window Cleaning
serviceType.description: You've tried cleaning your windows and they still look cloudy? Restore the shine in your windows with a professional clean.

serviceType.label: Gutter Cleaning
serviceType.description: Leaky gutters? We'll remove what's clogging your gutters by hand; meaning we won't carelessly blow the dirty stuff out onto your property below, causing more of a mess.

serviceType.label: General Handiman Services
serviceType.description: Broken fence? Room needs painting? We handle non-structural and non-electrical repairwork, appliance installation, wood staining, and much more.

mission.statement: Our aim is to provide a quality experience with satisfying results. "Customer service is what matters the most to me, which is why I choose keep the business small. We're not in competition with the bottom to pack out a busy schedule, instead our focus is to ensure that we do a good job and leave our customers happy."
